name: Vegetarian Sliders
author: Marsha Pierce
summary: These sliders are a quick and easy vegetarian appetizer or main dish. They are filled with gooey mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, basil, and garlic.
ingredients: 1 (12 count) package Hawaiian bread rolls (such as King's®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Set the bottom halves into the bottom of the prepared pan and spread with marinara sauce
Place a layer of mozzarella cheese over the marinara and add a layer of tomatoes over the cheese
Spread basil over the tomatoes and add the top halves of the rolls
Combine melted butter, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and Italian seasoning in a bowl; stir to combine
Brush over the tops of the sliders
Bake in the preheated oven until the insides are gooey and the tops are golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes
